price: Mú (ìtàn) ’Ibrọ̄hīm wá sí ìrántí (bí ó ṣe) wà nínú al-Ƙur’ān. Dájúdájú ó jẹ́ olódodo pọ́nńbélé, (ó sì jẹ́) Ànábì.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi ib'rāhīma innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
